title: "Machine learning-based prediction model using clinico-pathologic factors for papillary thyroid carcinoma recurrence | Scientific Reports"
excerpt: "The performance of five machine learning models related to recurrence prediction was compared based on accuracy. The Decision Tree model showed the best accuracy at 95%, and the lightGBM and stacking model together showed 93% accuracy."
